Summary: a red ball was flying in the sky, and just kept flying around, around, and again around until it got so late, i had to stop
divs: Sighting Detailsi was sitting around,the power was out and i was hoping to catch sight of a ufo,when i got hungry, got a snack and when i came back, there were red spheres floating in the sky, and i watched them, as i had seen a bigger one ever since the power had been out,and they were there for about 3 hours, and it looked like they were sparring, as they would fly right at each other,then i put my snack mess away, as quickly as possible, but when i returned,they were gone.i felt like i was going to cry,i had always wished to see a ufo,now i have seen them.i made sure it was no plane,as the lights did not blink,it would hover, and it was too fast, it was night, so it wasnt a bird with a reflection, it wasnt a reflection, i looked out the window to make sure it wasnt,and it was obviously a close encounter type 1.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Oak Harbor
There were no other sightings in Oak Harbor on or around October 11th 2005
